greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer partitions of n such that the difference between the length of the minimal square containing and the maximal square contained in the Young diagram is 1.
comment: The maximal square contained in the Young diagram of an integer partition is called its Durfee square, and its length is the rank of the partition.
link: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..150
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Apr 08 2019
